name: apples
title: Dried Apples
subtitle: Dried Apples
description:
Nuts for nuts? Well, when it comes to these picks, weâ€™d say you just have great taste! Our Nutty Best Sellers variety pack puts you at the ready to snack on our smashingly delicious bestsellers on the move. Take our 1.5 oz bags of our Roasted Almonds, Roasted Cashews and Roasted Pistachios (In Shell) on a road trip, shoe shopping marathon, white water rafting excursion, to an axe throwing birthday party or ANYWHERE you need a satisfying snack packed with healthy fats and protein. Contains 24 individual bags in all.

Read More

Our Nutty Best Sellers Variety Pack includes 24 (1.5oz) bags of:

  • Roasted Almonds (8)
  • Roasted Cashews (8)
  • Roasted Pistachios (In Shell) (8)

Now Available in Single Serve Packaging!

  • Contactless & Safe Snacking - whether you are sharing or eating on your own, the individual packaging limits the number of touchpoints.
  • Portion Control - Single serving size to help balance out our daily nutritional needs
  • Grab and Go! - wherever you may travel, take a little bag of snacks on the way

ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.description: Apples, Sulphur Dioxide. (May Contain Pits and/or Pit Fragments). Packaged in the same facility as peanuts, tree nuts, soy, and milk products.
